transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Grips of the Skybreaker

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a high chance to grant you a dose of Venomous Potential. At 5 doses, inject them into your target to deal 201,664 Nature damage over 3 sec.

Dealing Nature damage has a chance to grant you an additional dose.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to let loose a nascent empowerment from the crystal, increasing a random secondary stat by 3,329 for 20 sec.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 10,051 for 15 sec.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
